Courses

Find here a collection of materials, summaries and study-guides on a variety of scientific subjects, including numerical methods, differential equations, complex systems, mathematical biology, statistics. These texts are ongoing, and frequently updated... For quick hands-on tutorials, see Codes.

Estourando a bolha: como opinião se espalha na sociedade

Pop the bubble: how opinion spreads on society is an entertaining guided-study to High School students about Network structure and Opinion dynamics, focusing on lessons of Mathematical modeling and Complex systems.

Methods of numerical integration for ODEs

Summary and diagrams for numerical integration of ODE and systems of ODEs.
